title: How to show the save dialog box with IDAPython?
content: I want to some strings to the text-file which is chosen from the save dialog box. Is there any way to show the save dialog box by IDApython and how to write the script code about that ?

answers_data.content:
Sounds like you want ida_kernwin.ask_file , as in:

self.filename=ida_kernwin.ask_file(1, "*.xml", "Enter name of export xml file:")
